pipeline.status_ui¶

Status UI for Google App Engine Pipeline API.

class pipeline.status_ui.BaseRpcHandler[source]¶

Base handler for JSON-RPC responses.

Sub-classes should fill in the ‘json_response’ property. All exceptions will be returned.

class pipeline.status_ui.ClassPathListHandler[source]¶

RPC handler for getting the list of all Pipeline classes defined.

class pipeline.status_ui.RootListHandler[source]¶

RPC handler for getting the status of all root pipelines.

class pipeline.status_ui.StatusUiHandler[source]¶

Render the status UI.

class pipeline.status_ui.TreeStatusHandler[source]¶

RPC handler for getting the status of all children of root pipeline.
